primaryColor.x-prompt: What HEX color should be used to generate the M3 theme? It will represent your primary color palette. (ex. #ffffff)

secondaryColor.x-prompt: What HEX color should be used represent the secondary color palette? (Leave blank to use generated colors from Material)

tertiaryColor.x-prompt: What HEX color should be used represent the tertiary color palette? (Leave blank to use generated colors from Material)

neutralColor.x-prompt: What HEX color should be used represent the neutral color palette? (Leave blank to use generated colors from Material)

includeHighContrast.description: Whether to create high contrast override theme mixins
includeHighContrast.x-prompt: Do you want to generate high contrast value override mixins for your themes?. Providing a high contrast version of your theme when a user specifies helps increase the accesibility of your application.

directory.description: Workspace-relative path to a directory where generated theme file will be created
directory.x-prompt: What is the directory you want to place the generated theme file in? (Enter the relative path such as 'src/app/styles/' or leave blank to generate at your project root)

isScss.description: Whether to generate output file in scss or CSS
isScss.x-prompt: Do you want to generated file to be a scss file? This is the recommended way of setting up theming in your application. If not, a CSS file will be generated with all the system variables defined. (Leave blank to generate a scss file)
